title: SMC_TRAFO_Bipod_Arm (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_TRAFO_Bipod_Arm
The transformation computes the inverse transformation of a bipod
with two rotary axes.
The origin of the coordinate system is at the center of the tool plate
if both axes are in zero position (horizontal).
The direction of positive rotation is shown for the first axis A and the
second axis B.
In the above diagram, both axes are in position 0Â°.
Note
For more information on the supported transformations,
see the chapter on CNC transformations.
